website_summaries.verdict: This family-friendly set includes the essentials for 4 to play, and is suitable for causal backyard fun.
pros: Comprehensive set includes 4 rackets, 4 shuttlecocks, and 2 carrying bags
Rackets come in 4 colors, plus they are lightweight and feel comfortable in the hand
cons: Some durability and longevity issues with the rackets have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Racket broke within the first week!
customer_reviews.text: One of the rackets broke within a week of owning them! Couldn’t have been used more then twice. Total disappointment and waste of money. Amazon will only refund you if you ship the item back and that’s a complete waste of my time. There should be an option for a partial refund or sending a replacement for faulty merchandise should be free. These were $60 and although that’s not a ton of money it was expensive enough that we thought they would be higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd day.
customer_reviews.text: Broke on 2nd day. Poor quality. Strings are weak. It was decent price but not a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jay K.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper version
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made and not strong enough. Not worth money. No different then buying cheaper. 5 star with Good customer service. They resolve issue
customer_reviews.author: PurVesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: Nice rackets
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, lightweight rackets, good for badminton beginners. The paint chips fairy easily if you happen to hit a hard surface accidentally. One of the rackets string broke already though, not sure if it was user caused or product issue but the other 3 rackets are working fine. You get 4 birdies as well, which are pretty good. Update: Ok another racket strings broke now with no obvious cause I could see and we had not used it long. So starting to think its a product issue.
customer_reviews.author: Soanie LaPaix

customer_reviews.title: Great for begginers
customer_reviews.text: We are spending quarantine time using these every day. They are great for beginners. Very light weight. I love how they have different colors. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Racquets for hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Since we couldn’t play tennis as a family in Covid, we purchased these Racquets and a cheap Net. These Racquets are perfect, with a different color for each of use to always use, good quality construction and well wrapped soft handles with a good balancing weight. We are having hours of fun and I’m glad I purchased these as the ones that came with the cheap net via another company we terrible. Highly recommend A+
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: nice zipper case will last longer longer than rackets,  extremely over priced.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be two $20 sets combined to make a $65 four player set. Senston seems to have a good reputation for their high end carbon fiber rackets but this set does not include those. Read the other reviews . . . The carry cases will out last strings in these rackets.
customer_reviews.author: SJS Dallas

customer_reviews.title: They work but...
customer_reviews.text: The rackets work however there are two issues I've noticed. The pink racket makes a rattling kind of sound like something is broken inside. The second issue is the black wrap on the handle. Just playing around for a little while has dislodged the wrapping and it is peeling off with some gentle use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D.

customer_reviews.title: Family time excuse
customer_reviews.text: As we've all been stuck at home "with our children" I' discovered how much time our family does not spend time together....What could we do considering the circumstances. Croquet set? Monopoly? Hhhmm What else? Saw the Senston Badminton Rackets 4 Pack and thought .. This could work... Just had some requirements re: the construction of the racquet for durability. Most are assembled with clamping the arm/neck to the head. Eventually the clamps will lose their grip making the racquet worthless. Senston's kit included racquets constructed as one piece ohh sorry. .. geting back to my review.... FAMILY LOVED IT! RENEWED APPROVAL FROM THE FAMILY
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Great fun- highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to play as a family when we hosted Easter. With the Covid quarantine we broke these out early and have been having such a great time, all things considered. They come with a case that holds two rackets each. Rackets are good value for the price. Recommend- a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: CommodoreKid

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: We got these end of April and 2 of the rackets strings were broken by the 2nd week of May. The strings just snapped when hitting the birdie. These were expensive but made very poorly and not worth the money! Updated Review-After I posted my 1st review I was contacted by customer service and they sent me two new rackets. I’m amending my review to 3 stars-the 1st ones still broke, but amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: C. Serio

customer_reviews.title: Garbage for price
customer_reviews.text: For about $15 a piece, these seem like horrible quality; not that $15 is a lot for badminton rackets, but I think that you could do better for that price. We were only sent 2 of the 4 in the set, which is fine because they could just be exchanged, but I will not be replacing them with the same item because I was very unimpressed. To be fair, I did not try them because I have to return them due to not being sent the whole set, but I would have returned them based on my initial reaction to their quality regardless.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandsons and must admit we’ve had our share of fun with them ...but, c’mon, can’t you make racquets that are more substantial? The handles on one of the racquets came unraveled quickly and I needed to staple it the prevent further unraveling. The racquets are strung reasonably well. The shuttle cocks are also cheap. The rubber cover came off one of them during play so we just continued playing without it. The covers are nicely made however.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: The BEST quarantine purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: For kids and adults alike, these are so light and easy. Pretty sturdy quality, my husband's friends can't stop coming over to play. The review is mostly for the rackets and case. The birdies, I don't think they're terrible, but I definitely think you'll want to supplement with better ones, if you want better accuracy and less wind-factor, if playing outside like we are. Other than that, amazing! I'm glad we went with the 4-pack instead of the 2.
customer_reviews.author: SalseraOn2RN

customer_reviews.title: Handle wrapping came off after few uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought set of four to play in the backyard. After few days of playing the handle wrap completely unraveled for two of the four rackets, making them unusable. I always stored them properly, in their bags, out of the sun or water. I can already tell that will happen also with the other two. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CDk

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Obviously not the most competitive rackets out there but a great great choice for friends and family to use. Won’t break the bank but not a piece of crap that starts falling apart and getting birds stuck in the strings on hard hits. Really good for the money. Well made and through dozens of games none of my family have had any complaints about them.
customer_reviews.author: Contrakt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets. Light weight and seems to be good quality that I don’t think we’ll be breaking them anytime soon. Good value and looking forward to more badminton matches with the family!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great set for family back yard fun. The bags make for easy storage and everything seems to be good quality. We’ve played several games since getting these and haven’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpea555

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: They seem like the cheap stuff you could get at the Dollar Store. Embarrassed because I got them for gift. Not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: DECENT.  The "carrying case" is more impressive than the rackets !
customer_reviews.text: Pretty "meh"...I miss the nice "wood" quality of my youth..these cheap metal versions are so not-satisfying to use. The "carrying case" is pretty impressive...kind of wish they spent more making decent rackets...and less on the fancy case!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality with loosen  grip tap and squeezed shuttlecock.
customer_reviews.text: The nylon shuttlecocks were squeezed in the bag and cannot be played as they are out of shape. The grip tape on the handles of both racket looses after played just 30 minutes and the sticky wooden handle expose to hand. The frame is a bit too thick, thicker than most frames I used. The thick frame increases the chances of hitting the frame while playing.
customer_reviews.author: B St

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the grand child and adults, who are not pros, but love to play. You can't beat the 2 Cases & different colors of rackets for the price and quality. Delivery was quick and I'd buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L Mardesich

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids, basic usage only
customer_reviews.text: This didn't suit me as I am an intermediate to expert level player. This is good for kids, and for beginners only. The rackets are normal one, and scratching it takes the steel off from it. We used it for few days and it didn't work well. The plastic birdies are OK. I think they are expensive for the normal quality provided.
customer_reviews.author: Sudheer Raju

customer_reviews.title: Perfect So Far!
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and a perfect weight! Nice carrying case too! I bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E.

customer_reviews.title: Grip Tape Fell Off 1st Use and Slight Wobble
customer_reviews.text: I bought these expecting they'd be good quality rackets for the $60 price tag. I am very disappointed and wish I had returned them within the return period. Two big issues: 1- The grip tape came off during the first use on both rackets that we used. 2- The handle is a separate piece from the rest of the racket. The way the two pieces fit together is not perfectly snug and you end up with a small but noticeable wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Price is outrageous but you get what you pay so for so I'm very happy. Idk if there are smaller rackets for kids, cause kids have to choke up on the handle other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Not a great quality racket
customer_reviews.text: So we got these a couple weeks ago and two of the grips have already started to unravel. They are light weight and tightly strung but we will have to re wrap them after only playing with them for a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Order received is not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Order came very quickly BUT I am missing two of the four badminton rackets that were supposed to have shipped ... I only received 1 bad (2 rackets and 2 birdies). I have sent feedback to the seller and hope to get this resolved .....
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B. Thurgood

customer_reviews.title: Grip came off
customer_reviews.text: I had used it few times only yet and grip has come off. I am a casual player and when I played grip came off. This has happened with two of the rackets. There were cheaper options also available on Amazon but I chose this for better quality but disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish V

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Pretty Impressive
customer_reviews.text: The racket set is really good. I picked these up with a net from another vendor and can say it was worth it. It comes with four rackets, two bags and four shuttlebirds. Very light, love the colors, easy to differentiate for each person and just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for my daughter and I. We're having a great time playing badminton in the driveway during shelter in place. It's a great way to get exercise in and get outside time too!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Pastel colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors are a lot lighter then shown. More pastel colors. Product seems a little weak. But worked fine. The bags are nice to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Nikndawn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice to receive everything included. It was short 2 shuttles? You would think for that money it would all be there. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Railean

customer_reviews.title: Great set of rackets for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Budget rackets, nice to have a set of four. They seem very nice and no issues so far (owned for several months and used a lot).
customer_reviews.author: John D. Paden

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼 Good set
customer_reviews.text: Nice carrying cases, comfortable grip and seem to hit pretty well (for backyard recreation anyway). We’re really enjoying this as a quarantine activity — bought LED birdies so we can play at night too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable quality  poor shuttlecocks
customer_reviews.text: Racquets are pretty light weight, good for beginners. The shuttlecocks are plastic and tend to miss form. Not sure how long these will last.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Head

customer_reviews.title: Store birdies outside of bag
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Store birdies outside the case or they get ruined. Played with them quite a lot and they are still in tact. Paint is already chipping but we are that great
customer_reviews.author: Truvu

customer_reviews.title: Hit or Miss. Not all on package got same quality.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and had some strength on racquet. Was working fine until 2 out of 4 racquets I ordered, nets tear spart and became useless. Birdie pair came with package not so good, but starter kind.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Depp

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are a little pricier than I wanted to spend for a random summer hobby, but I feel like they are really nice quality and will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Strings broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed that the strings on one of the rackets broke after the second use. I paid more thinking these were a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: reviewmom

customer_reviews.title: Great badminton rackets
customer_reviews.text: These were a great set of recreational rackets but the birdies were not that great. The plastic was very bent and didn’t mold well so that they fly that well. But for the price the rackets are great!
customer_reviews.author: From Rocklin, CA

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Extremely overpriced racket set. I was very disappointed when I opened these up, the quality is very cheap. These will probably break in a month. I don't recommend this for $65 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Julian C

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: This was part of a group buy with a net and it has really been great. Love the rackets (with 4 always have a spare) and so far holding up just great. That is with daily use two times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Cheap for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how they can make metal so flexible. They bent the second time we used them, but have held up ok since then.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap rackets, definitely not worth the price. Wrapper broke within 3 weeks. Birdies are deformed and can’t fly. We chose those item because it was double the price of everything else, but the quality disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No net
customer_reviews.text: My mistake. If I had realized that the net and posts we not included, I would never have ordered this set. As it turns out, getting just a net and poles is NOT easy. The he product is a good product, I’m just an idiot.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P.

customer_reviews.title: Handle wrap
customer_reviews.text: They are decent rackets. Only problem was the handle wrap came loose on first use - they were unusable until taped
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality! Strings broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: We used these racquets only TWICE before the strings broke on not one but TWO racquets! Such a cheap waste of money. The shuttles are cheap plastic too.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We haven't played in year and picked up the portable net as well. The racquets are good quality and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: T. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set to play in our backyard. The rackets are nice and like that they came with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. Not a big fan of the plastic shuttle cocks but for this price it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: sbandy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: We bought some rackets that were cheaper and they simply don't hold up. The strings on these rackets are much more solid and have held up well to our initial use. It's worth the extra $20-30 to get these over the cheap ones available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Madia

customer_reviews.title: 7 of 8 rackets still going (1 broke first day)
customer_reviews.text: My friend has a set and I bought one. Good rackets. The only reason I knocked it down to 4 stars was one of my rackets broke first day. The handles are a light wood and the shaft only goes in about 2 inches. Since I am judging the product out of 8, it is 7 of 8 came good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N Stonaker

customer_reviews.title: fun family game.
customer_reviews.text: I play with my older grandchildren. They really like it. We all get a good workout!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay to buy for kids only, it didn’t break yet but not that strong either.
customer_reviews.author: Tanji

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple of times so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: chris weiss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product...Sturdy and Quality....Working out very well for playing during this pandemic. .. The customer service is excellent. When I had a problem with the rackets, they send me 2 rackets within no time and that made my kids happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sree

customer_reviews.title: The strings snap very easily rendering these racquets pretty useless
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship for these racquets are extremely poor. I purchased 4 of these and in less than a month 3 of them have the strings snap. Unfortunately, I am unable to return these. Stay away from this brand as it is utterly useless and made of poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: chandsa

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy set. Has been used many times and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mister

customer_reviews.title: Solid - Great value for $$...
customer_reviews.text: All good - you can really take a cut at the birdie with this set; solid racquets for the money...!
customer_reviews.author: waves2ya

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These have been used all spring and they’re still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara L Velesko

customer_reviews.title: Great Badminton Rackets
customer_reviews.text: These rackets are some of the best I have ever owned. I play badminton with these every single day and love them. They are durable and light-weight. They have great value for the money you put in. If you are looking to take your game to the next level, these rackets are for you!
customer_reviews.author: Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Great rackets
customer_reviews.text: We play these all the time. Sturdy and clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: michael b sumerton

customer_reviews.title: Read what’s included- not a set!
customer_reviews.text: This is nice but be forewarned....there is no net included in this! My review reflects that. For something that includes 4 racquets and birdies I was kind of surprised no net.
customer_reviews.author: Jennirun

customer_reviews.title: Basic rackets & birdies for novice players.
customer_reviews.text: One racket already fraying at the base (Wrapping is coming off.)
customer_reviews.author: 5Dibs

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product in quality and price at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: Prose: - Reasonable price Cons: - Cheap product, specially plastic shuttlecocks
customer_reviews.author: Ali Shahrokhi

customer_reviews.title: Fun with Exercise!!!
customer_reviews.text: The set is good for the entire family. Beginners will start off and continue with intermediate training through adults. This included my neighbors and friends. Its lightweight and good value for the price. I love it.Fun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: The rackets are just decent that's why for the price paid it comes with 4 qty. It's good for kids to use and adults that just started to play badminton again or someone that's just looking for spares. But so far we're happy with this set for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these rackets! The wrap on the racket where you hold it slides off so either don't remove the plastic or wrap it extra with some tape. Other than that, I love these rackets and this is my second time purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Recreational ONLY (very!)
customer_reviews.text: Frame construction is good but grip is flimsy and already popped strings on 2 racquets after only couple weeks of play. You get what you pay for. Aim for better quality product
customer_reviews.author: SYED AHMAD

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product. Not at all what we expected. We bought this as a beginners set but expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica BW

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Net of 1 out of 2 used rackets broke with in a few days of playing. Thought rackets are very lightweight and need less strength to let shuttle fly properly but could have been little stronger
customer_reviews.author: neha amritphale

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these all summer with the kids with no issues. Strings have stayed tight and 4 different colors are nice.
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality not worth money
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for what you get. Poor quality. Birdies already broke tape coming off racket handles first day. Requesting some sort of refund
customer_reviews.author: Christine Davis-Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Rackets seem fine. The grip is good too. Initially I had issues with the shuttles provided, but seller contacted me and replaced the shuttles with new good ones. Great work on their part. Happy with the set now.
customer_reviews.author: Paras Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Handles Tape Comes off
customer_reviews.text: Decent rackets. We have only had a few weeks and the wrap on the handles is already coming off. Pretty disappointing considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price........
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not that great. Think twice before buying or else it will cost you a 20% restocking fee just for returning it. SUCH A RIP OFF!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oh lala

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok just to use for practice. It’s flimsy. Good enough for the lock down. Hard wind will make the net move.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Fine set for less serious players
customer_reviews.text: Net must be anchored with something heavy piled on center ground panel or blows over in a breeze. Sets up and takes apart easily. Overall, I would recommend the set. It comes complete with shuttlecocks. —R
customer_reviews.author: Robin L. Kropf

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality. Made in CHINA. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Love the game!! It’s hard to find badminton sets anymore, although for the price it’s not worth it. Very overpriced for rackets and birdies that break very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far no problems. Have used them a month or so now.
customer_reviews.author: YoMomma

customer_reviews.title: Pure Junk
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk! The wrap on the handles came off the first day!!!! I had to put duck tape on them I. Order for the kids to play with them. Very poor quality for $69.95.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought it. It was worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lee

customer_reviews.title: One of the racket broke after first couple of days of play
customer_reviews.text: One out of the four racket nylon broke after playing couple of times. Please check out the attached pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Great set for badminton, not strong enough for volleyball though
customer_reviews.text: The rackets and birdies along with the net are great, but the volleyball is not meant for the same net, not nearly strong enough to withstand hits from a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Razzano

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Crap.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Got the rackets and birdies today. I can only imagine how long they might last. Maybe one game? Cheap and way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong strings
customer_reviews.text: We finally get to play badminton and not have the birdie go through the racket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! this is a must buy for family activity!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price - nice rackets if u don’t need the net...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these rackets for use with a volleyball net I already had. I really like the protective carrying case they come with. Also, the birdies are well made, still look like new after weeks of heavy use...
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The cases looked nice but they are poorly made. The rackets, birdies and cases are broken after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Olaf

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a low cost!
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing . It is durable and of good quality. We use it for nightly games on the street. The whole neighborhood plays and enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good quality. Cases are nice as well. Kiddos love the highlighter colored birdies.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B.

customer_reviews.title: my grandsons and the parents like this.
customer_reviews.text: I used it and the rackets are light weight and work well. I just wish I was better at it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Grand Moe

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and small.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and smaller racket for the price. It is suitable for kids only.
customer_reviews.author: Bhishma

customer_reviews.title: Low low low quality product
customer_reviews.text: The worst product. Did not lost for 2 days. Strings are so weak and broken first day. Handles grip came off second day. Fully bended frame. Never buy this product. I think it’s from China. Way poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anuradha Brahma

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer Activity
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family has been playing with this badminton set and having lots of fun! It definitely helps to have lots of activities this summer to stay entertained!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. My kids love them. The only issue was the tape started coming off one of the handles within the first 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Patnode

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: First time we used the set the tape unraveled from the handle. Not what I expected for $70.
customer_reviews.author: Hh

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: We received these rackets few weeks back & love them especially the colors - purple & baller pink. They are study too
customer_reviews.author: nil kris

product_meta.title: Senston Badminton Rackets 4 Pack, Badminton Set Including 2 Badminton Bag/4 Rackets/4 Nylon Badminton
feature_bullets: ★ PACKAGE INCLUDES ★ 2 Badminton Bag; 4 Badminton Rackets; 4 Nylon Badminton (Badminton racquet has the Stringing about 20lbs)

★ HAVE FUN WITH THE BADMINTON RACKET ★ This racket is perfect for beginner and casual entertainment. If you are looking for some professional racket, you could find them in our store at a very good price.

★ HIGH QUALITY ★ The racket has SOLID construction with ONE-PIECE design outside and built-in T-joint inside. It have been further improve the STABILITY, achieve high-precision control performance. It also avoid the deformation caused by playing badminton, make racket more stable, play unparalleled power

★ MATERIAL ★ The shaft of badminton racquet is made of Graphite, racket weight unstrung 90 grams, it is light. You can enjoy the badminton game longer and do not have shoulder pain caused by other heavier racket. It fell better when you playing. Carbon aluminum composite materials also enhance the strength of the racket, reduce to the risk of frame deformation
★ CUSTOMER SERVICE ★ If you have any problems after the purchase, you can feel free to contact us in any time.
